tool_description:
World's first latency-based IP Location service with VPN and Tor detection. (update daily)

'Registration Location' of an IP address can be very different from its 'physical location'. 

Our 'Latency-based IP Location' service use cutting edge telemetry tools to determine IP's 'physical location'.

For example:
213.196.52.1

registration country:Netherlands

physical country:Russia

checkout telemetry from Russia servers and Netherlands servers:

http://ui01.lxfarm.mephi.ru/too...
name: World First Latency IP Location
title: World First Latency IP Location

api_list.name: Get IP location with other intelligence data
api_list.description: Get IP location with latency measurement and VPN/Tor detection
